Luis Fernando Silva Castro de Araújo

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/0043603016656121
  • Última atualização do currículo em 05/06/2019

Post doc at CIDACS-FIOCRUZ Bahia. PhD in Psychiatry at the Psychiatry Department - Austin Health - Melbourne, Australia - The University of Melbourne. Master's degree in Clinical Medicine (Psychiatry Department) from Universidade Estadual de Campinas (2013), Campinas - SP. Graduation in Medicine from Universidade Federal da Bahia (2005), Salvador - BA. Has experience in Medicine, focusing on Psychiatry. Researcher of the following subjects: Brain and mind relation, statistical modelling of mental disorders, philosophy of psychiatry, and old age psychiatry. (Texto informado pelo autor)
